org.hackystat.sensor.eclipse.addon
Class JavaStatementMeter

java.lang.Object
  ASTVisitor
      org.hackystat.sensor.eclipse.addon.JavaStatementMeter

public class JavaStatementMeter
extends ASTVisitor

Implements a meter to measure several aspects such as number of methods, statements, test methods, assertion statements if applicable. Number of test methods, assertion statements is reported to assist Test-Driven Development study.

Author:
Hongbing Kou
